title: Under the Eagle
description: The story follows Roman soldiers Macro and Cato as they fight to survive and prove themselves during the Roman invasion of Britain.

title: The Eagle's Conquest
description: Macro and Cato continue their campaign in Britannia, facing rebel tribes and political intrigue within the Roman army.

title: When the Eagle Hunts
description: Sent on a dangerous mission beyond the Roman frontier, the two soldiers must confront betrayal and brutal warfare.

title: The Eagle and the Wolves
description: Macro and Cato are sent back to Britain to confront a growing rebellion threatening Roman control of the province.

title: The Eagle's Prey
description: The Roman army faces a powerful enemy as Macro and Cato uncover a plot that could change the fate of Britannia.

title: The Eagle's Prophecy
description: Assigned to a political mission, Macro and Cato become entangled in a dangerous rebellion within Roman ranks.

title: The Eagle in the Sand
description: The action moves to the eastern provinces where the soldiers face war, betrayal, and survival in the desert.

title: Centurion
description: Captured behind enemy lines, Macro and Cato must escape and warn Rome of an imminent invasion.

title: Old Man's War
description: Elderly recruits join an interstellar war, given new bodies and a second chance at life in humanity’s fight for survival.

title: The Ghost Brigades
description: Special forces soldiers engineered from the DNA of the dead fight covert wars across the galaxy.

title: The Last Colony
description: John Perry and Jane Sagan are tasked with leading a human colony under intense political and military pressure.

title: Redshirts
description: A group of low-ranking crew members discover they are living in a universe where expendable characters die first.

title: The Collapsing Empire
description: The stability of a vast interstellar empire is threatened when its primary method of travel begins to fail.

title: The Consuming Fire
description: Political intrigue and power struggles intensify as the interstellar empire moves closer to collapse.

title: The Last Emperox
description: The final struggle to save humanity unfolds as the interstellar empire faces total destruction.

title: Lock In
description: In a near future where a disease leaves millions locked in their bodies, a new kind of FBI agent investigates crime.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut stranded on Mars must use science, ingenuity, and humor to survive against impossible odds.

title: Artemis
description: A heist story set in the first city on the Moon, following a smuggler caught in a dangerous conspiracy.

title: Project Hail Mary
description: A lone astronaut wakes up in deep space with no memory and must solve a cosmic mystery to save humanity.

title: The Egg
description: A philosophical short story exploring reincarnation, humanity, and the meaning of existence.

title: Pietr the Latvian
description: Inspector Maigret investigates the mysterious murder of a criminal named Pietr in Paris.

title: The Strange Case of Peter the Lett
description: Maigret tracks a clever criminal known as Peter the Lett across the streets of Paris.

title: Maigret and the Yellow Dog
description: Maigret uncovers secrets in a small French village as a strange dog signals hidden crimes.

title: Maigret and the Tramp
description: The Inspector investigates the murder of a tramp, revealing dark secrets of Parisian society.

title: Maigret in Montmartre
description: Maigret is drawn into a murder case in the artistic quarter of Montmartre, facing deception and intrigue.

title: Maigret and the Headless Corpse
description: A decapitated body leads Maigret into a web of secrets and lies in Paris.

title: Maigret and the Enigmatic Lett
description: Maigret faces the enigmatic criminal known as the Lett, testing his skills in deduction and intuition.

title: Maigret in Holland
description: The Inspector travels to Holland to solve a complex case involving murder and international intrigue.

title: Maigret and the Burglar
description: A simple burglary turns into a murder investigation that tests Maigret's observational skills.

title: Maigret and the Spinster
description: A quiet spinster’s murder shocks her community, drawing Maigret into a labyrinth of secrets.

title: Maigret and the Milky Way
description: Maigret investigates a crime with unexpected cosmic overtones and human motives intertwined.

title: Maigret and the Wine Merchant
description: The Inspector probes a wine merchant’s death, uncovering greed, rivalry, and hidden vendettas.

title: Maigret and the Hotel Majestic
description: A murder at a luxurious hotel challenges Maigret to navigate the hidden lives of its elite guests.

title: Maigret in Court
description: Maigret attends a courtroom case that hides darker truths, requiring his insight beyond the law.

title: Maigret and the Toy Village
description: A seemingly peaceful village harbors secrets of murder and deception that only Maigret can uncover.

title: I, Robot
description: A collection of interconnected short stories exploring the ethical and practical challenges of robotics in the future.

title: Foundation
description: The first book in the epic Foundation series, chronicling the fall of the Galactic Empire and the rise of a scientific foundation to preserve knowledge.

title: Foundation and Empire
description: The Foundation faces the challenges of a declining empire and the emergence of a mysterious mutant known as the Mule.

title: Second Foundation
description: The hidden Second Foundation works behind the scenes to protect the future of humanity from the destabilizing forces of the galaxy.

title: The Caves of Steel
description: Detective Elijah Baley teams up with humanoid robot R. Daneel Olivaw to solve a murder in a futuristic, overpopulated Earth city.

title: Metahuman
description: A near-future sci-fi thriller where enhanced humans struggle with technology, ethics, and the consequences of their powers.

title: Redemption
description: Continuing the saga, the story explores political conspiracies, advanced tech, and the personal struggles of superhumans in a rapidly changing world.

title: The Last Wish
description: A collection of short stories introducing Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter navigating a morally complex fantasy world.

title: Sword of Destiny
description: Geralt faces new challenges and meets key characters that shape the events of the main Witcher saga.

title: Blood of Elves
description: The first full-length Witcher novel, exploring politics, war, and Geralt's role as protector of Ciri, a young girl with a dangerous destiny.

title: Time of Contempt
description: As war spreads across the Continent, Geralt and Ciri navigate treachery, magic, and powerful enemies threatening their lives.

title: The Tower of Swallows
description: Ciri’s path leads her through perilous encounters, as Geralt and his companions race against time to save her from deadly foes.

title: Polaris
description: Alex Benedict and his assistant chase down a stolen historical artifact, navigating danger and uncovering hidden truths across the galaxy.

title: Seeker
description: Antique dealer Alex Benedict investigates a mysterious disappearance that leads him into a web of historical intrigue and danger.

title: The Devil's Eye
description: Alex Benedict uncovers a long-lost artifact with deadly consequences, racing against rivals and uncovering centuries-old secrets.

title: Coming Home
description: Alex Benedict navigates treacherous intrigue and uncovers secrets surrounding a mysterious spacecraft and its artifacts.

title: Hyperion
description: The first book in the Hyperion Cantos, following seven pilgrims on a journey through a far-future universe filled with mystery, war, and the Shrike.

title: The Fall of Hyperion
description: The sequel to Hyperion, continuing the pilgrims' story as the galaxy faces war, political intrigue, and cosmic mysteries.

title: Summer of Night
description: A chilling horror story set in 1960s Illinois, where a group of kids confronts a mysterious and malevolent force in their small town.

title: The Terror
description: A historical horror novel following the doomed Franklin expedition to the Arctic, blending real events with supernatural terror.

title: The Absent One
description: Carl Mørck tackles a complex murder case in a small town, uncovering secrets that powerful people want to remain hidden.

title: A Conspiracy of Faith
description: Department Q investigates the disappearance of several children, revealing shocking abuse and a dark conspiracy.

title: The Purity of Vengeance
description: A brutal double murder leads Carl Mørck into the dark world of a Danish elite and hidden secrets from the past.

title: The Marco Effect
description: Carl Mørck returns with his team to track down a sadistic serial killer with connections to a previous case.

title: The Hanging Girl
description: Department Q faces a mysterious murder that unravels a web of lies and deception linked to past crimes.

title: Sharpe's Eagle
description: Richard Sharpe, a British soldier during the Napoleonic Wars, fights his way through Portugal and Spain, proving his courage and leadership.

title: Sharpe's Gold
description: Sharpe is assigned to recover stolen gold in Spain, navigating danger, betrayal, and the chaos of war.

title: Sharpe's Company
description: Sharpe leads his company in intense battles in the Peninsula War, facing brutal enemies and testing his leadership skills.

title: Sharpe's Sword
description: Sharpe is tasked with recovering a stolen sword and confronting a treacherous French officer during the Peninsular campaign.

title: Sharpe's Enemy
description: Sharpe faces a cunning French enemy who threatens his regiment and the lives of his comrades in Spain.

title: Sharpe's Honour
description: Sharpe uncovers a French conspiracy and must restore his honor while leading his troops in the heat of battle.

title: Eragon
description: A farm boy named Eragon discovers a mysterious dragon egg, setting him on a journey of magic, destiny, and rebellion against a tyrannical empire.

title: Eldest
description: Eragon continues his training as a Dragon Rider while confronting political intrigue, dangerous enemies, and the weight of his destiny.

title: Brisingr
description: Eragon faces powerful foes and discovers dark secrets, testing his courage, loyalty, and mastery of magic in his fight to free Alagaësia.

title: The Three-Body Problem
description: Scientists make contact with an alien civilization on the brink of destruction, setting off a chain of events that could change humanity's future forever.

title: The Dark Forest
description: Humanity faces an existential threat from an alien civilization, forcing a strategy of cosmic deterrence and philosophical reflection on survival.

title: Death's End
description: The epic conclusion to the trilogy, exploring the far future, interstellar conflicts, and the ultimate fate of humanity in a vast, indifferent universe.

title: Archaeology and Language: The Puzzle of Indo-European Origins
description: Renfrew explores the connections between archaeology and linguistics to trace the origins and spread of the Indo-European languages.

title: Before Civilization: The Radiocarbon Revolution and Prehistoric Europe
description: A groundbreaking study on prehistoric Europe, examining the impact of radiocarbon dating on understanding the development of early societies.

title: Metro 2033
description: In a post-apocalyptic Moscow, survivors live in the metro tunnels, where Artyom must journey through danger to save his people from a mysterious threat.

title: Metro 2034
description: The story continues in the metro tunnels as survivors confront new threats, exploring themes of hope, despair, and human nature in a devastated world.

title: Metro 2035
description: Artyom returns to the surface and the tunnels, facing the harsh realities of a post-apocalyptic Russia and confronting the ultimate fate of humanity.

title: A Game of Thrones
description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne, while an ancient threat rises beyond the Wall in the frozen North.

title: A Clash of Kings
description: The Seven Kingdoms are in chaos as multiple claimants battle for the throne, while war and intrigue spread across Westeros.

title: A Storm of Swords
description: As alliances shift and betrayals abound, the battle for Westeros intensifies with shocking twists and devastating consequences.

title: A Feast for Crows
description: The aftermath of war leaves Westeros fragmented, with new players rising and old powers struggling to maintain control.

title: A Dance with Dragons
description: The struggle for the Iron Throne continues, as Jon Snow defends the Wall and Daenerys Targaryen faces challenges in Meereen.

title: The Winds of Winter
description: The next installment in the epic saga, promising new battles, betrayals, and twists in the ongoing fight for Westeros.

title: Leviathan Wakes
description: A missing woman and a derelict ship trigger a conspiracy that threatens the fragile balance between Earth, Mars, and the Belt.

title: Caliban's War
description: Humanity faces a new alien threat as tensions rise between the planets, and the crew of the Rocinante must navigate political and military dangers.

title: Abaddon's Gate
description: A mysterious alien ring opens a gateway in space, sparking a race to control it and testing the loyalties of the Rocinante crew.

title: Cibola Burn
description: Colonists on a new alien world face deadly conflicts, while the Rocinante crew works to prevent a war and uncover hidden truths.

title: Nemesis Games
description: The Solar System faces unprecedented threats from extremists and pirates, forcing the crew of the Rocinante to confront their pasts and protect humanity.

title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
description: Cold War espionage at its finest, as British agent Alec Leamas undertakes a dangerous mission behind the Iron Curtain.

title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
description: George Smiley investigates a Soviet mole within the British intelligence service, navigating deception, betrayal, and moral ambiguity.

title: The Honourable Schoolboy
description: Smiley continues to unravel Soviet espionage operations in Southeast Asia, confronting corruption, danger, and complex loyalties.

title: Smiley's People
description: George Smiley comes out of retirement to uncover a Soviet spy network, facing psychological games and deadly intrigue.

title: A Legacy of Spies
description: Peter Guillam reflects on past espionage operations and confronts the consequences of Cold War secrets in this reflective thriller.

title: Déjà Dead
description: Forensic anthropologist Temperance Brennan investigates a series of brutal murders, using her scientific expertise to uncover the killer.

title: Death du Jour
description: Brennan is called to Quebec to examine a body that reveals shocking secrets, blending forensic science with a suspenseful investigation.

title: Deadly Decisions
description: Temperance Brennan faces political and personal challenges while solving a case involving a murdered forensic colleague.

title: Fatal Voyage
description: Brennan investigates a suspicious death aboard a cruise ship, uncovering deception, murder, and danger at sea.

title: Grave Secrets
description: A body discovered in Quebec leads Brennan into a complex web of family secrets and deadly deception.

title: Bare Bones
description: Brennan uncovers the truth behind a mysterious murder while balancing her personal life and the demands of forensic investigation.

title: Red Mars
description: A team of scientists and engineers begins the colonization and terraforming of Mars, facing political, ethical, and environmental challenges.

title: Green Mars
description: Terraforming progresses as conflicts arise between Earth authorities and Mars colonists striving for independence and sustainability.

title: Blue Mars
description: Mars achieves political autonomy and ecological stability, but new social, technological, and ethical dilemmas challenge the colonists.

title: Theft of Swords
description: Rogues Royce and Hadrian embark on daring adventures, combining cunning, swordplay, and intrigue in a fast-paced fantasy tale.

title: Rise of Empire
description: The adventures of Royce and Hadrian continue as political conspiracies and deadly enemies threaten the kingdom.

title: Heir of Novron
description: A climactic conclusion to the Riyria Revelations trilogy, where loyalty, bravery, and cleverness are tested against overwhelming odds.

title: The Crown Tower
description: A prequel to Riyria Revelations, introducing young Royce and Hadrian as they take on their first dangerous mission together.

title: The Rose and the Thorn
description: In this Riyria Chronicles installment, Royce and Hadrian uncover plots, confront deadly foes, and forge alliances in a rich fantasy world.

title: The Death of Dulgath
description: The duo faces powerful enemies and unravel dark secrets in their quest for justice, adventure, and survival.

title: Never Die
description: Royce and Hadrian confront the supernatural and political conspiracies, testing their courage and friendship to the limit.

title: The Earth Quarter
description: A science fiction novel exploring dystopian futures and the complex interplay between technology and society.

title: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire
description: Set in the Star Wars universe, this novel follows smuggler Dash Rendar as he navigates danger, intrigue, and galactic conflict.

title: Batman: Child of Dreams
description: A graphic novel adaptation exploring psychological depth and crime-fighting adventures of Batman in Gotham City.

title: Hyperspace: A Scientific Odyssey Through Parallel Universes, Time Warps, and the Tenth Dimension
description: Kaku explores advanced concepts in physics, from higher dimensions to parallel universes, making complex ideas accessible to general readers.

title: Visions: How Science Will Revolutionize the 21st Century
description: A forward-looking examination of how emerging technologies will reshape society, medicine, and human understanding in the 21st century.

title: Physics of the Impossible
description: Kaku categorizes and analyzes technologies often considered impossible, from teleportation to invisibility, through the lens of modern physics.

title: The Future of Humanity
description: An exploration of humanity's future in space, discussing colonization, interstellar travel, and the challenges of sustaining life beyond Earth.

title: Night's Dawn: The Reality Dysfunction
description: A sprawling space opera where humanity faces a terrifying threat from beyond the grave, combining high-stakes adventure and complex world-building.

title: Night's Dawn: The Neutronium Alchemist
description: The second installment in the Night's Dawn trilogy, expanding the universe and escalating conflicts with high-tech civilizations and supernatural forces.

title: Night's Dawn: The Naked God
description: The epic conclusion to the Night's Dawn trilogy, resolving interstellar wars, political intrigue, and supernatural mysteries on a grand scale.

title: Lost Civilizations of the Stone Age
description: An exploration of prehistoric societies, challenging conventional views on human history and investigating mysterious archaeological findings.

title: A Study in Scarlet
description: The first Sherlock Holmes novel, introducing the brilliant detective and his companion Dr. Watson as they investigate a mysterious murder in London.

title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound threatening the Baskerville family on the foggy moors of England.

title: Heir to the Empire
description: The first book of the Thrawn Trilogy, introducing Grand Admiral Thrawn as he threatens the New Republic with cunning strategy and military genius.

title: Dark Force Rising
description: The New Republic faces new challenges as Thrawn continues his campaign, testing the resolve and intelligence of the heroes of the galaxy.

title: The Last Command
description: The thrilling conclusion of the Thrawn Trilogy, where loyalty, strategy, and courage determine the fate of the galaxy.

title: Star Wars: Specter of the Past
description: The continuation of the Star Wars Expanded Universe, with the New Republic confronting political intrigue, hidden threats, and galactic adventure.

title: The Cuckoo's Calling
description: Private investigator Cormoran Strike investigates the suspicious death of a supermodel, uncovering secrets, lies, and danger in London’s elite circles.

title: The Silkworm
description: Strike is drawn into the literary world to solve the disappearance of a controversial author, revealing dark motives and hidden rivalries.

title: Career of Evil
description: Cormoran Strike faces a personal and chilling threat as he investigates a series of murders linked to his own past, testing his skills and resolve.

title: The Bat
description: Detective Harry Hole investigates a series of murders linked to a serial killer in Oslo, revealing the dark underbelly of the city.

title: Cockroaches
description: Harry Hole travels to Thailand to solve the murder of a Norwegian ambassador, facing danger, corruption, and a complex criminal network.

title: The Redbreast
description: A chilling neo-Nazi plot emerges as Harry Hole investigates, intertwining historical crimes with contemporary danger in Norway.

title: Nemesis
description: Harry Hole confronts a mysterious string of crimes and betrayal within Oslo, unraveling secrets that threaten lives and justice.

title: The Devil's Star
description: Harry Hole faces a cunning serial killer, testing his investigative skills against a backdrop of suspense, danger, and psychological tension.

title: Last Rituals
description: Thóra Gudmundsdóttir, a lawyer-turned-investigator, tackles a mysterious murder that intertwines Icelandic folklore with chilling crime.

title: My Soul to Take
description: Detective Thóra investigates a series of enigmatic murders linked to dark secrets and ancient legends, blending suspense and Nordic atmosphere.

title: The Day is Dark
description: Thóra faces a terrifying mystery as a hidden killer stalks the city, and she must navigate Iceland’s eerie landscapes and secrets.

title: The Silence of the Sea
description: A suspenseful thriller where Thóra uncovers sinister plots and deadly secrets in a remote Icelandic coastal town.

title: Children of Time
description: A terraforming project goes awry, leading to a civilization of intelligent spiders and the remnants of humanity struggling for survival across the stars.

title: Children of Ruin
description: Continuing the epic saga, humanity encounters a new alien civilization on a distant planet, challenging survival, diplomacy, and ethics.

title: Empire in Black and Gold
description: The first in the Shadows of the Apt series, following a world divided by insect-like castes and the rise of a human hero challenging ancient powers.

title: The Plantagenets: The Warrior Kings and Queens Who Made England
description: A vivid account of the Plantagenet dynasty, detailing the lives, battles, and intrigues of England's medieval kings and queens.

title: The Wars of the Roses: The Fall of the Plantagenets and the Rise of the Tudors
description: A gripping narrative of the Wars of the Roses, chronicling the dynastic battles and political maneuvers that shaped England’s monarchy.

title: Magna Carta: The Birth of Liberty
description: An exploration of the creation and legacy of the Magna Carta, explaining its significance for liberty, law, and the development of modern democracy.

title: Kindred
description: A modern African-American woman is mysteriously transported back to antebellum Maryland, confronting slavery, survival, and personal identity.

title: Parable of the Sower
description: In a dystopian future, a young woman develops a new belief system while navigating societal collapse, violence, and community-building.

title: Parable of the Talents
description: The sequel to 'Parable of the Sower,' continuing the story of survival, faith, and resistance in a fractured and violent society.

title: Dawn
description: The first book of the Xenogenesis Trilogy, where a woman awakens in an alien environment after Earth's destruction, exploring identity, humanity, and interspecies ethics.
